name: Ice Cream Rush
description:
Ice Cream Rush is a game created for the 187th weeklygamejam. The game is about creating custom ice cream cones for customers that come to your ice cream truck. Serve faster than your rival and earn more than them before the day ends to win.

The theme for the Game Jam was 'Ice Cream Truck'

All the assets and programming was created using Autodesk Maya and Unreal Engine 4.
